title: looking for specimen
content:
I am looking for pdf specimen of Plantin and Quadraat.

thanks
author: sebsan

comments.content:
Fontshop website has pdfs, eg top right [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419223957/http:/www.fontshop.com/?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&searchby=manufacturer&displayfontid=FF.11674.0.0).  
Linotype's fonts also mostly have pdfs.

Sebastien, out of an interest to better serve FontShop visitors, can you tell me where you were looking for PDFs and not finding them?

Checked your site, btw. Your work is great.

Hi Stephen,

Thanks for the compliment about my work.

Now I understand how to get to the PDFs.  
What's confusing is that it says "see PDF for complete specimen" but it doesn't really tell you where to click. I would like to be able to click on the word PDF to emmediatly start downloading the entire specimen I am interested in.
A very good point and our list of future improvements.
